alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Mellette (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 20 at 5:21PM MDT until June 20 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northwestern Mellette County in south central South Dakota... Northeastern Jackson County in southwestern South Dakota... * Until 545 PM MDT/645 PM CDT/. * At 521 PM MDT/621 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Belvidere, or 11 miles east of Kadoka, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Mellette and northeastern Jackson Counties around Belvidere. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 160 and 174. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: This cluster of thunderstorms is capable of producing tornadoes and widespread significant wind damage. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
